department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Intermediate Video Workshop: Studio Course
course.description: An extended nonfiction or experimental video project of the student's design, supplemented by brief exercises aimed at exploring the capabilities of the medium.
course.prerequisites: One VES half-course in video production.
course.notes: Students seeking to enroll should come to the first class meeting with a proposal for a video project to be completed in the course.
